Interests

Video Games

I play video games extensively. Dota 2 (my dotabuff page) is my most played game, which I’ve spent more than 3000 hours on. My highest MMR was around 5k, but I haven’t played ranked games since a long time ago.

I have played World of Warcraft (as a rogue only!) for more than 10 years, and most of my time was spent in CN region. I started playing in US region since Tier 19, and raided semi-hardcorely with a top-30 US guild to clear Tomb of Sargeras (my warcraftlogs). I’m currently AFK, since I find it hard to spend 10 hours raiding every week, and WoW is not that attractive as it was before.

Besides Dota and Wow, I also love playing adventure/role playing/strategy games. This includes The Elder Scrolls series, Divinity: Original Sin series, Civilization series, Stellaris, Total War series, and so on. Check my steam profile to find more!

Arcade Games and Music

I’m a fanatical arcade rhythm game fan, with Dance Dance Revolution and Jubeat being my most played games.

I also play (casually) other rhythm games like Beatmania IIDX, SOUND VOLTEX and CHUNITHM, and I love trying out new ones. SEGA’s ONGEKI is my current new favorite.

Because of my interests towards rhythm games, I developed a deep fond of speedcore/dubstep/future bass music. My favorite artists include t+pazolite, かめりあ, and Laur.

Anime

I’m a huge Japanese anime and manga fan. Check MyAnimeList to see if you share a similar taste with me!
